document_data.name: Anthather's Mill
document_data.mainbody: '''Anthather's Mill''' was a water mill somewhere in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Location: Anthather's Mill stood over a fork in the road. The land around it was largely farmlands, broken up by large stones.
document_data.Structure: The building was made of fieldstone, and had a pool where the stream that turned its wheel was dammed. The pool continued along one of the roads.
document_data.History: A [[Chosen of Mystra]], [[Elminster Aumar]], asked for directions at Anthather's Mill when looking for the [[Riven Stone]], learning it was just down the road from there.
